title: Dominica
summary: Dominica is a country in Caribbean. The capital is Roseau. Population: 67,408. Area: 751 kmÂ².

images.alt: The flag of Dominica has a green field with a large centered tricolor cross. The vertical and horizontal parts of the cross each comprise three bands of yellow, black and white. A red circle, bearing a hoist-side facing purple Sisserou parrot standing on a twig and encircled by ten five-pointed yellow-edged green stars, is superimposed at the center of the cross.

attribution.note: National flags are in the public domain.
